==Trivia==
* This soundtrack is guaranteed to play when the player either enters the The Glowing Narrows subarea or had visited it last before logging into the game. ''A Route to Fantasies'' then plays on loop after this soundtrack finishes or after exiting combat in the subarea.
* <section begin="GloweringNarrowsTheme" />The following soundtracks share a theme:
** [[A Path to Delusions]]
** [[A Route to Fantasies]]
** [[Impending Danger]]<section end="GloweringNarrowsTheme" />
